languages.text: {n}Губернатор, обернувшийся к вам, не успевает ничего сказать — Малгар бьет его шоковой дубинкой.{/n} "Не утруждайтесь, господин губернатор. Я сам все объясню!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Губернатор не успевает ничего сказать — Малгар со всей силы бьет его по лицу прикладом.{/n} "Да вы не утруждайтесь, сам все объясню!"

languages.text: {n}The governor turns to you but does not get the chance to say anything as Malgar strikes him with a stun baton.{/n} "Don't trouble yourself, Lord Governor. I'll explain myself!"
languages.original_text: {n}Губернатор, обернувшийся к вам, не успевает ничего сказать — Малгар бьет его шоковой дубинкой.{/n} "Не утруждайтесь, господин губернатор. Я сам все объясню!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The governor turns to you but doesn't get to say anything as Malgar strikes him with a shock baton.{/n} "Don't trouble yourself, Governor, 'sir.' I'll explain myself!"
{n}The governor turns to you but doesn't get to say anything as Malgar strikes him with a shock baton.{/n} "Don't trouble yourself, Governor, 'sir.' I'll explain myself!"
{n}The governor turns to you but doesn't get a chance to say anything as Malgar strikes him with a stun baton.{/n} "Don't trouble yourself, 'sir' Governor. I'll explain myself!"
{n}The governor turns to you but doesn't get a chance to say anything as Malgar strikes him with a stun baton.{/n} "Don't trouble yourself, 'sir' Governor. I'll explain myself!"
{n}The governor turns to you but does not get the chance to say anything as Malgar strikes him with a stun baton.{/n} "Don't trouble yourself, Lord Governor. I'll explain myself!"
{n}The governor turns to you but does not get the chance to say anything as Malgar strikes him with a stun baton.{/n} "Don't trouble yourself, Lord Governor. I'll explain myself!"

languages.text: {n}Der Gouverneur wendet sich zu dir, bekommt jedoch keine Gelegenheit, etwas zu sagen, denn Malgar schlägt ihn mit einem Schockknüppel.{/n} "Macht Euch keine Mühe, Lord Gouverneur. Ich erkläre es selbst!"
languages.original_text: {n}The governor turns to you but does not get the chance to say anything as Malgar strikes him with a stun baton.{/n} "Don't trouble yourself, Lord Governor. I'll explain myself!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Gouverneur wendet sich zu dir, bekommt jedoch keine Gelegenheit, etwas zu sagen, denn Malgar schlägt ihn mit einem Schockknüppel.{/n} "Macht Euch keine Mühe, 'Sir'. Ich erkläre es selbst!"

languages.text: {n}Le gouverneur se tourne vers vous, mais avant qu'il n'ait le temps de vous dire quoi que ce soit, Malgar le frappe d'un coup de matraque paralysante.{/n} « Ne vous donnez pas cette peine, seigneur gouverneur... je vais lui expliquer tout ça moi-même. »
languages.original_text: {n}The governor turns to you but does not get the chance to say anything as Malgar strikes him with a stun baton.{/n} "Don't trouble yourself, Lord Governor. I'll explain myself!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le gouverneur se tourne vers vous, mais avant qu'il n'ait le temps de vous dire quoi que ce soit, Malgar le frappe d'un coup de matraque paralysante.{/n} « Ne vous donnez pas cette peine, "seigneur" gouverneur... je vais lui expliquer tout ça moi-même. »

languages.text: {n}总督转向你，刚想开口说话，但马尔加抄起电棍给了他一棍子，让他闭了嘴。{/n}“不必劳烦你了，总督‘大人’。我会自己解释的！”
languages.original_text: {n}The governor turns to you but does not get the chance to say anything as Malgar strikes him with a stun baton.{/n} "Don't trouble yourself, Lord Governor. I'll explain myself!"

traits.locale_text: {n}总督转向你，刚想开口说话，但马尔加抄起电棍给了他一棍子，让他闭了嘴。{/n}“不必劳烦你了，总督‘先生’。我会自己解释的！”

languages.text: {n}総督はあなたに向き直るが、何を言う間もなくマルガーからスタンバトンで殴られた。{/n}「ご心配なく、『総督』。私が直々に説明しましょう！」
languages.original_text: {n}The governor turns to you but does not get the chance to say anything as Malgar strikes him with a stun baton.{/n} "Don't trouble yourself, Lord Governor. I'll explain myself!"

traits.locale_text: {n}総督はあなたに向き直るが、何を言う間もなくマルガーからスタンバトンで殴られた。{/n}「ご心配なく、『総督』。私が直々に説明しよう！」

languages.text: {n}El gobernador se vuelve hacia ti, pero no tiene oportunidad de decir nada porque Malgar le golpea con una porra aturdidora.{/n} «No se moleste, lord Gobernador. ¡Me explico yo mismo!».
languages.original_text: {n}The governor turns to you but does not get the chance to say anything as Malgar strikes him with a stun baton.{/n} "Don't trouble yourself, Lord Governor. I'll explain myself!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El gobernador se vuelve hacia ti, pero no tiene oportunidad de decir nada porque Malgar le golpea con una porra aturdidora.{/n} «No se moleste, "señor" Gobernador. Me explico yo mismo».

languages.text: {n}Vali sana dönüyor ama daha tek kelime edemeden Malgar'ın şok copunu yiyiveriyor.{/n} "Zahmet etmeyin sayın valim. Ben açıklarım!"
languages.original_text: {n}The governor turns to you but does not get the chance to say anything as Malgar strikes him with a stun baton.{/n} "Don't trouble yourself, Lord Governor. I'll explain myself!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Vali sana dönüyor ama Malgar ona şok çubuğuyla vurunca bir şey söyleme fırsatı bulamıyor.{/n} "Zahmet etmeyin sayın Lord Vali. Ben açıklarım!"
